insert into vam_cart(cartId, memberId, bookId, bookCount) values (#{cartId}, #{memberId}, #{bookId}, #{bookCount})

mapper.select: select a.cartId , a.memberId , a.bookId , a.bookCount , b.bookName , b.bookPrice , b.bookDiscount from vam_cart a left outer join vam_book b on a.bookId = b.bookId where memberId = #{memberId}
